Somalia: • Face to face outreach discussions • Production and distribution of video testimonies, fliers, billboards, radio programs and mobile cinema’s for screening purposes • Radio and television programs on the dangers of irregular movement through drama/theatre, talk shows, and testimony screenings • Engagement and collaboration with local implementing partners and governmental counterparts • Engagement with celebrities and influencers
